Articles.Content: Title pretty much says it all. this would be especially useful for those of us on laptops that lack a middle mouse button to control whack a kerbal and camera panning
Yes, please. Reduced functionality on laptops is bad business.

Agreed. Also, it shouldn't have taken me ages of digging around google to figure out how to zoom on a Mac laptop when my MMB broke. It's Shift+Scrolling on the touchpad, but that isn't listed anywhere useful.

But at any rate, yes, more extensive function mapping to keyboards and touchpads would be great.

I remember when I used to play the game on a laptop. It ran perfectly in every way, much better than the desktop I have now, except one: No middle mouse button. I was very lucky that the map controls were remappable, or the game may have been unplayable beyond LKO. I support this wholeheartedly.

if you are on linux check out my sig for a fix!
